configuration.name: Epsilon-greedy with recency-weighted reward average, nonstationary bandit

option.name: PARAMETERS
option.value: --random-seed 12345 --T 1000 --n-runs 2000 --figure-name "Epsilon-greedy with recency-weighted reward average, nonstationary bandit" --pdf-save-path "../figures/Epsilon-greedy with recency-weighted reward average, nonstationary bandit.pdf" --environment rlai.core.environments.bandit.KArmedBandit --k 10 --reset-probability 0.005 --agent rlai.core.EpsilonGreedyQValueAgent --epsilon 0.2 0.1 0.01 0.0 --alpha 0.1 --plot --log INFO
